name: base64-compressor
description: Compress and encode data as URL-safe base64 string

scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf build/cjs/* && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --format=cjs --outfile=build/cjs/index.js && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > build/cjs/package.json
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf build/esm/* && esbuild src/**/*.ts --minify --sourcemap --format=esm --outdir=build/esm && echo '{"type": "module"}' > build/esm/package.json
scripts.build:web: rm -rf build/web/* && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --format=iife --global-name=Base64Compressor --outfile=build/web/base64-compressor.js && cp build/web/base64-compressor.js* docs
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && npm run build:web && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.release: npm run build && npm publish --access public
